conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway with clear wall geometry and height.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of 3D transformation with clear wall thickness and volume.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout preservation; room adjacencies and wall proportions match exactly.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture blocks, kitchen fixtures, and even the garage car are correctly placed per plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, but text labels from the 2D plan are baked onto the 3D floor surface, which is a minor presentation artifact.

detected_errors.description: Original text labels and dimension lines are visible on the floor texture of the 3D model.

summary: A remarkably faithful and geometrically precise 3D conversion that captures every room and detail of the original floor plan.
